   9: module bp_be_top
  10:  import bp_common_pkg::*;
  11:  import bp_common_aviary_pkg::*;
  12:  import bp_common_rv64_pkg::*;
  13:  import bp_be_pkg::*;
  14:  import bp_cfg_link_pkg::*;
  15:  #(parameter bp_cfg_e cfg_p = e_bp_inv_cfg
  16:    `declare_bp_proc_params(cfg_p)
  17:    `declare_bp_fe_be_if_widths(vaddr_width_p
  18:                                ,paddr_width_p
  19:                                ,asid_width_p
  20:                                ,branch_metadata_fwd_width_p
  21:                                )
  22:    `declare_bp_lce_cce_if_widths(num_cce_p
  23:                                  ,num_lce_p
  24:                                  ,paddr_width_p
  25:                                  ,lce_assoc_p
  26:                                  ,dword_width_p
  27:                                  ,cce_block_width_p
  28:                                  )
  29: 
  30:    // Default parameters 
  31:    , localparam proc_cfg_width_lp          = `bp_proc_cfg_width(num_core_p, num_cce_p, num_lce_p)
  32:    , localparam ecode_dec_width_lp         = `bp_be_ecode_dec_width
  33:    
  34:    // VM parameters
  35:    , localparam tlb_entry_width_lp = `bp_pte_entry_leaf_width(paddr_width_p)
  36:    )
  37:   (input                                     clk_i
  38:    , input                                   reset_i
  39:    , input                                   freeze_i
  40: 
  41:    // Config channel
  42:    , input                                   cfg_w_v_i
  43:    , input [cfg_addr_width_p-1:0]            cfg_addr_i
  44:    , input [cfg_data_width_p-1:0]            cfg_data_i
  45: 
  46:    // FE queue interface
  47:    , output                                  fe_queue_deq_o
  48:    , output                                  fe_queue_roll_o
  49:  
  50:    , input [fe_queue_width_lp-1:0]           fe_queue_i
  51:    , input                                   fe_queue_v_i
  52:    , output                                  fe_queue_yumi_o
  53: 
  54:    // FE cmd interface
  55:    , output [fe_cmd_width_lp-1:0]            fe_cmd_o
  56:    , output                                  fe_cmd_v_o
  57:    , input                                   fe_cmd_ready_i
  58: 
  59:    // LCE-CCE interface
  60:    , output [lce_cce_req_width_lp-1:0]       lce_req_o
  61:    , output                                  lce_req_v_o
  62:    , input                                   lce_req_ready_i
  63: 
  64:    , output [lce_cce_resp_width_lp-1:0]      lce_resp_o
  65:    , output                                  lce_resp_v_o
  66:    , input                                   lce_resp_ready_i                                 
  67: 
  68:    , input [lce_cmd_width_lp-1:0]            lce_cmd_i
  69:    , input                                   lce_cmd_v_i
  70:    , output                                  lce_cmd_ready_o
  71: 
  72:    , output [lce_cmd_width_lp-1:0]           lce_cmd_o
  73:    , output                                  lce_cmd_v_o
  74:    , input                                   lce_cmd_ready_i
  75: 
  76:    // Processor configuration
  77:    , input [proc_cfg_width_lp-1:0]           proc_cfg_i
  78: 
  79:    , input                                   timer_int_i
  80:    , input                                   software_int_i
  81:    , input                                   external_int_i
  82:    );
  83: 
  84: // Declare parameterized structures
  85: `declare_bp_be_mmu_structs(vaddr_width_p, ptag_width_p, lce_sets_p, cce_block_width_p)
  86: `declare_bp_common_proc_cfg_s(num_core_p, num_cce_p, num_lce_p)
  87: `declare_bp_be_internal_if_structs(vaddr_width_p
  88:                                    , paddr_width_p
  89:                                    , asid_width_p
  90:                                    , branch_metadata_fwd_width_p
  91:                                    );
  92: 
  93: // Casting
  94: bp_proc_cfg_s proc_cfg;
  95: 
  96: assign proc_cfg = proc_cfg_i;
  97: 
  98: // Top-level interface connections
  99: bp_be_issue_pkt_s issue_pkt;
